content.title: Compression Garments for Lymphedema
content.description: Use of graduated compression garments in lymphedema management

key_concepts.details: Maintain volume reduction achieved during intensive phase of CDT
Class I (20-30 mmHg), Class II (30-40 mmHg), Class III (40-50 mmHg), Class IV (>50 mmHg)
Custom-fitted garments preferred; require professional measurement and fitting
Garments lose compression over time; replace every 4-6 months

content.clinical_significance: Essential maintenance therapy after volume reduction
